Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below with two added white bands; exterior: wide brown band at rim, reserved below.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
For a similar rim pattern, see Lemos 1991, no. 1070 from Ephesus.
Bibliographic references: CVA Heidelberg I / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Heidelberg Universität Band I (p. 14, no. 19, pl. 3)
Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 303, no. 1125, pl. 154, no. 1125)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1176) (phase 2)
